page.description: Returns the length and decimals for all field types other than Character and Numeric

argument.name: Size_Info
argument.description: A dot variable with two elements:

argument.name: type
argument.description: The name of a field type. Character

page.discussion: The A5_FIELDSIZES() function returns information about the size of table fields that are not character or numeric.
page.example: ? a5_fieldsizes("time") = decimal = 0 Length = 17 ? a5_fieldsizes("date") = decimal = 0 Length = 8
